contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|data}} {{wiktionary|storage}} '''Data storage''' can refer to: * [[Computer data storage]]; memory, components, devices and media that retain digital [[data (computing)|computer data]] used for computing for some interval of time. * Any [[data storage device]]; that records (stores) or retrieves (reads) information ([[data]]) from any medium, including the medium itself. ==See also== *[[Information processing]] *[[Signal processing]] *[[index card]] *[[punched tape]] *[[teleprinter]] *[[Joseph Marie Jacquard]] *[[keypunch]] *[[punched card]] *[[Rainbow Storage]] [[ar:تخزين البيانات]] {{disambig}}
